features: Specially designed to complement Dreft detergent

body.description: Draft Blissful in-wash scent booster gives you more of the baby fresh scent you love. Use Draft Blissful in any load of laundry for lasting freshness that you can enjoy with every wiggle and tickle of baby's fabrics. Your child is only a baby for one year, but Draft Blissful allows you to bring back that amazing baby scent (and all those memories) whenever you want.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Laundry's Fragrant Bliss - Scent Enhancement at Its Best!
reviews.reviewText: Dreft Blissfuls In-Wash Scent Booster Beads are an absolute delight! The scent they impart to clean laundry is fantastic, providing that extra boost of freshness that makes every load a blissful experience.These beads work wonders, infusing clothes with a long-lasting, baby-fresh aroma that elevates the laundry game. Plus, their easy dispensing method makes them a breeze to use.For anyone craving that extra scent boost for their clean laundry, these Dreft Blissfuls are a game-changer. The convenience and the fragrance enhancement they offer make them a must-have addition to your laundry routine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the best fabric softener you can purchase. The clothes come out so soft and the smell is amazing, not overwhelmingly obnoxious like some of the other brands. I use it the most on my husband’s clothes, as he seems to sweat a lot and this takes out all of the unpleasant odors. I like him to put on a clean shirt and smell how fresh and clean it is. It also doesn’t smell like a baby product so you don’t have to worry about that. I would use it with every load I do, but the cost prevents me from doing this. For laundry like towels, I just use the cheaper liquid fabric softener, like the Sam’s brand, and my towels come out super soft with it, but the nice smell does not hold well like with these. I just wish that I could find a way to purchase them cheaper than they are, so I just limit using them for the stinky clothes. He also has many dry fit shirts from expensive brands like Land’s End, L.L. Bean and Eddie Bauer. They advise not to use any fabric softener ever. Apparently with these type of shirts, the liquid fabric softener can cause a waxy buildup in the fibers, where they won’t work with cooling that they are intended to provide. I don’t feel like these cause any build up and there isn’t a concern with these about staining your clothing since I have been using these consistently and I have not had any problems. I highly recommend these and hopefully the company will come down on the price at some point. The other brands tend to be too highly priced as well. The good thing is that it doesn’t take a large amount for the desired results. I think if you purchase these that you will never buy any other brand of this type of product in the future. These spoil you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dreft economy size beads
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. It smells just like baby Dreft Detergent scent. Fresh baby smell, while clothes are in the dryer.,Its a great economical , larger size , makes it a great value. Is with free prime shipping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing baby product
reviews.reviewText: These Dreft scent boosters are a game-changer for baby laundry! The gentle, baby-friendly fragrance adds a delightful freshness to clothes and linens. They dissolve easily, leaving no residue, and the scent lasts. A must-have to keep baby's clothes smelling sweet and clean. Already purchased Thrice!! 😍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Scent last very long time
reviews.reviewText: I love the baby smell this has. It's not strong scent and with a little used the smell last a long time while in the closet or in the dresser. I have cleaned all of the baby clothes a month before babys arrival and it smelled so fresh. It has not irrated the babys skin and I use it on everything we clean for her. All I can say is I'm mainly just obsessed how fresh and light it smells.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Little too strong for me but nice smell. Won’t purchase again, no fault of the product, it’s a preference. Use a few beads until you get the right amount is my suggestion. I didn’t like in laundry but I’m using in little mesh drawstring bags that I hang in an outside garbage can where I put used doggy pee pads. Works great. Too strong for my drawers in my bedroom also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will definitely buy again
reviews.reviewText: Omg this made my baby's clothes smell so good. It's not too strong it has this soft scent to it. Smells really refreshing

reviews.reviewTitle: 36$ pour ce format c'est trop! Oui ça sent bon mais vraiment déçue
reviews.reviewText: 36$ pour ce format c'est trop! Oui ça sent bon mais vraiment déçue

After reading reviews i decided to try this and i am very happy with the results. My laundry smells amazing! At timesbl i find the smell can be overpowering so I adjust and use half cups on each each wash. It comes down to personal preference i guess. I love the light fresh scent it adds to my clothes and sheets.
